buffs.buffText: The opponent cannot gain pips and draw cards from effects this turn.
Your opponent's applied pips this turn do nothing.
The enemy monster's attack gains recoil X, where X is the number of buffs your opponent applied.~RECOIL~

abilityText: Active Passive: Whenever the enemy monster attacks with a ranged [RANGED] attack, the enemy attack gains recoil 1.~RECOIL~

teamAura.name: Cut Through
teamAura.text: Your ranged [RANGED] monster attacks gain pierce X, where X is the number of buff slots used.~PIERCE~
